features: This exquisite bangle showcases a fusion of modern aesthetics and traditional South Indian craftsmanship. The centerpiece features a striking square-cut Emerald, framed by a delicate halo of sparkling diamonds, creating a mesmerizing contrast. The intricately designed band showcases a unique chevron pattern adorned with pave-set diamonds, adding a touch of contemporary elegance. The lattice-like gold filigree surrounding the emerald adds a traditional flair. The bangle has a secure clasp to guarantee an easy and safe fit.
colors: Primarily gold with brilliant white diamonds and a vibrant green emerald centerpiece.
occasions: Perfect for special occasions like weddings (Vivaha)
or milestone celebrations. Also suitable for upscale parties and social gatherings where you want to make a statement.
description: A stunning statement piece that blends traditional design elements with modern sophistication. The vibrant emerald and sparkling diamonds are a symbol of prosperity and good fortune. The Hyderabadi polish ensures a lasting luster and showcases the exceptional craftsmanship. A perfect heirloom piece to be treasured for generations. The unique chevron pattern on the band is eye-catching and modern, making it suitable for both traditional and contemporary ensembles.
